name: Cypien
description:
Cypien is a mobile applications development firm based in Bucharest, Romania, providing app solutions for a range of sectors like banking, finance, travel, utility, lifestyle, education, and several others. Backed by a young and dynamic team of developers with 5+ years of experience, Cypien is prepared to design and develop mobile apps at special prices, taking your business to the next level.
Our successful projects prove our commitment to offer quality to all of our current partners and future clients.
